Your most valued online destinations are just a glance away on your home screen!

With the innovative CMANYA New-Tab Extension, you can seamlessly elevate your browsing experience by adding your cherished bookmarks directly to your home screen. This user-friendly extension transforms your new tab page into a personalized gateway to your digital world, allowing you to effortlessly access your favorite websites with a single click.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", you accept and agree to installing the CMANYA extension and setting Chrome New-Tab to that provider by the service and the Terms of Use (https://cmanya.com/end-user-license-agreement/) and Policy (https://cmanya.com/privacy-policy/). The extension's search functionality will be provided by Microsoft Bing.
